solution_code: public class Solution {--newline----newline--    int sum = 0;--newline--    --newline--    public TreeNode convertBST(TreeNode root) {--newline--        convert(root);--newline--        return root;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    public void convert(TreeNode cur) {--newline--        if (cur == null) return;--newline--        convert(cur.right);--newline--        cur.val += sum;--newline--        sum = cur.val;--newline--        convert(cur.left);--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}--newline--
